alert.note: Alert for Custer County; Gallatin National Forest; Golden Valley County, Musselshell County; Northern Rosebud, Northern Treasure Counties; Wheatland County, Sweet Grass County; Yellowstone County (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued August 01 at 2:04PM MDT until August 02 at 9:00PM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM MDT TUESDAY... * IMPACTS: Low humidities, hot temperatures, and strong gusty winds will create erratic fire behavior and new fire starts. * AFFECTED AREA: In South Central MT Fire Zones...123...124...127...128. In Southeast MT Fire Zones...130...132. * COUNTIES AFFECTED: In Central MT...Golden Valley...Musselshell...Wheatland. In South Central MT...Park...Sweet Grass...Yellowstone. In Southeast MT...Custer...Rosebud...Treasure. In Southwest MT...Gallatin. * WIND: West 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to 35 mph. * HUMIDITY: As low as 8 percent. * TEMPERATURES: In the mid to upper 90s.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.

area.areaDesc: Custer County; Gallatin National Forest; Golden Valley County, Musselshell County; Northern Rosebud, Northern Treasure Counties; Wheatland County, Sweet Grass County; Yellowstone County
